title: Earthquake
tips: Drop, cover, and hold on during the shaking. Afterward, be prepared for aftershocks and check for injuries and damage.

title: Hurricane
tips: Evacuate if instructed, secure your property, and stock up on essential supplies. Monitor weather updates closely.

title: Tornado
tips: Seek shelter in a sturdy building or a tornado shelter. Avoid windows and cover yourself with a mattress or heavy blankets.

title: Flood
tipsr: Move to higher ground if flooding is imminent. Do not drive through flooded roads, and ensure your emergency kit is ready.

title: Tsunami
tips: Move inland or to higher ground immediately if a tsunami warning is issued. Stay away from coastal areas.

title: Wildfire
tips: Evacuate if instructed and follow fire safety guidelines. Keep windows and doors closed and have a wildfire action plan.
